tasks.label: black
tasks.command: source ${HOME}/.zshrc; conda activate base; autoflake --remove-all-unused-imports --recursive --remove-unused-variables --in-place --exclude=__init__.py ${file}; isort ${file} --profile black; add-trailing-comma ${file}; black ${file}; add-trailing-comma ${file}; black ${file}

tasks.label: ruff
tasks.command: source ${HOME}/.zshrc; conda activate base; ruff check --fix .; ruff format ${file}
